post.body: just cuz i should have read it doesn't mean i have actually had time to!!!
that isn't fair! i wish my dad would pull their plug, but he is sleeping right through the annoying tunes!
yesterday grandma told grandpa she has cancer. Now his blood pressure is 220/120. He can't remember names and won't go to doctor.
I didn't mean to touch him!
Lookin for pictures in the clouds! We found a dolphin and sea horse and turtle and heart and a boot and a swam boat!
We found an awesome station on serius radio and the driver is totally loving it but won't admit it cuz he was listening to classical earlier
Yay for hannah montana! This is a fun ride!
I have a huge problem! I think i need to see a psychiatrist. If you want to know about it, feel free to ask, but be warned. story is long!
Spent the 15 minute car ride trying to explain to my mom what gaydar is Hahaha
i love shopping! But the mall is pretty crazy today!
Today we bought and put up a christmas tree. There is nothing like the smell of a real christmas tree to make it feel like christmas! :)
Anyone want to hang out or do something? My brother is sick and i do NOT want to be around him!
can't focus on hw. so excited for lexi to come home tomorrow!
wow that is stupid!
she commits suicide by drowning herself?
Wait, how exactly does she die?
my neighbor's house plays the music until sunrise, so it is literally ALL NIGHT!
Btw steph and lexi, thanks a whole the for ruining the awakening for me!
I understand Tiffles! My neighbors house does the same thing! I have listened to the same christmas songs over and over! So loud!
I agree with alex. He really doesn't!
I love you Kristen!
Both me and Kristen totally looked left Haha
Erik blue shades is stupid! Don't play it.
Steph, i will bring you all ur stuff later during break.
I have the entire contents of steph's locker in my trunk. Taking all the clothes home to wash them so mooring doesn't throw them away.
Riots? What? Jess get you butt over here! that would be so so amazing!
Jess i would leap for joy and scream my heart out!
Is it all good because you solved the problem or because you quit?
Today has been amazing! :)
I love not going to class!
Brownies baked and choice piece typed. Skipping the rest of my hw and saying good night.
i forgot to make the brownies for spanish class tomorrow. And do the choice piece. i get to do everything now. Yay.
At least you got to go somewhere rather than home to do calculus! And you have erik and lexi and kennedy and more! Not just stupid ex.
S so so so pissed! So incredibly pissed! i don't remember the last time i was this pissed. I have to get braces all over again! Shit! No!
Virginia Military Institute is convinced that i keep filling out all these forms for their college. But i am not. No way am i going there!
Men of snow
Mooring does better speeches.
Yay steph is next again! Finally!
Scared me too!
Seriously i really want her back!
Great job steph!!!
Really need to sit down and do a ton of hw but i also really don't want to!
Just spend 30 minutes playing with an Azusa pacific university interactive christmas card. I feel kinda stupid but it was actually fun!
Just woke up. I am gunna be so screwed when i have to start getting up at 530 every morning for school.
Guilt is torture.
Why alex?
Anyone want to hang out today?
Its ok Kristen. I don't park very well either. It is hard!
Attention! Attention! Stephanie Anne Moon is indeed black!
Me and Tiffles are so tired we like fell off the bed with laughter!
Happy new year!
If i was a music binder where would i hide?
I will be bored at home. I wish i would have known you were free Tiffles
NEVER drop a full bowl of salsa on the carpet!
So frustrated. Kind of angry too. But life keeps going. All i can do is keep breathing.
I am really glad you like everything Steph! And don't worry about it Maz!
Kristen, you really shouldn't bother listening to the mean things she says. That is pure evil! And so far from the truth! So so far!!!
I hate group projects!
Maz's quote of the day "everything tastes better when you put it in your mouth with two sticks!"
Steph, ingrid said good night to you!
